\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, come ye, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let us walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w cast|strong="H5203"\w* off thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* times past, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H6430"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* soothsayers \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H6430"\w* adhered \w to|strong="H1004"\w* strange \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* horses: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* chariots \w are|strong="H0834"\w* innumerable. \w Their|strong="H4390"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* adored \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* own \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w bowed|strong="H7817"\w* \w himself|strong="H0376"\w* \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w been|strong="H5375"\w* debased: therefore \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*.

\w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* thou \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w hide|strong="H2934"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* pit \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w*.
